name: Asuna's Positive Feelings
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Identity of the "Wife"" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.
【AUTO】 Accelerate ［Put the top card of your deck into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: All right, stop moping!

name: Beacon of Hope, Asuna
ability: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. （This damage may be canceled）

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "On Top of the 《World Tree》" is in your climax area, until end of turn, all of your characters get +5000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's stock."
flavor_text: ---Let's go!

name: Asuna's Special Moment
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Choose one of your 《Avatar》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: These two years have been very important to me. They seem that way now.

name: Asuna's Handmade Cooking
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other characters you have is one or less, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power.
【ACT】 Brainstorm ［(1)］ Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, this card gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: A year of training and study.

name: Asuna In a Birdcage
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another "Kirito - Two Worlds", this card gets +2000 power.
flavor_text: I still do……

name: Asuna Yuuki
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 Change [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Beacon of Hope, Asuna" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: Let's go.

name: Bride of the Fairy King, Asuna
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Kirito - Two Worlds" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kirito - Two Worlds" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.）
flavor_text: He'll…… come to save me.

name: "Living Legend" Heathcliff
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Asuna's Domestic Side
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of characters you have with "Assist".

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and return that card to your opponent's deck. Shuffle your opponent's deck afterwards.
flavor_text: That takes care of the stew.

name: Asuna's Gentle Appearance
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 【REST】 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: Sorry for involving you in that.

name: Asuna's Coy Smile
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavor_text: I always have and always will. That you're my hero……

name: 《Undine》 Girl, Asuna
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text: Let's go, Leafa.

name: 《Lead Group》 Holiday, Asuna
flavor_text: Mm……

name: Akihiko Kayaba
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] Choose one of your 《Avatar》 characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: --Now then, I must be going.

name: Asuna Spending Her Vacation
flavor_text: Oh, fine.

name: Asuna Putting Herself in the Front Lines
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: So I'll accept your offer, and take it easy today.

name: Territory Leader of 《Cait Sith》, Alicia Lu
flavor_text: For a big liar, you're pretty strong.

name: Asuna's Gift
ability: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have an 《Avatar》 character, this card cannot be played from hand.
Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Kirito: "This is probably……"

name: On Top of the 《World Tree》
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavor_text: Asuna: "Yui……"

name: Identity of the "Wife"
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Ah… Ah ha ha…

name: Skilled 《Sylph》, Leafa
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn that character gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavor_text: ……so what should I do now?

name: Virtual and Reality, Leafa & Suguha
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Fairy Dance" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: I don't think it's just a game, not right now.

name: Unyielding Girl, Leafa
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Yui: "That one was your fault!"
Leafa: "Seriously."

name: Suguha Cheering On Her Brother
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Kirito's Unshakable Belief" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kirito's Unshakable Belief" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

【AUTO】 Change ［(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kirito's Younger Sister, Suguha" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: You can't give up on the one you love so easily.

name: Virtual World Girl, Leafa
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your 【STAND】 《Avatar》 characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavor_text:
"I want to see virtual reality for myself."
When did I first think that to myself.

name: Suguha Changes Clothes
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 and 《Net》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: Wah.

name: "Speedholic" Leafa
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Now, follow me!

name: "Veteran Player" Leafa
ability: 【CONT】 You cannot play climax cards from your hand during your climax phase.
flavor_text: It's fine…… But I can't guarantee that you'll survive.

name: Kirito's Younger Sister, Suguha
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When a card named "Memories from Last Night" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 1 or lower 《Avatar》 character, put it on any position of your stage, shuffle your deck, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: ……I still can't really believe my brother and I are actually cousins.

name: Wondering Girl, Leafa
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Um～……

name: Tutor, Suguha
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +3000 power.
flavor_text: I could be your tutor.

name: Worrisome Recon
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a climax in your clock, return it to your hand, choose a card from your hand, and put it into your clock.
flavor_text: ……you aren't coming?

name: Leafa's Journey from Her Territory
flavor_text: --The desire to seek others……

name: Suguha Cooking
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Then want to get it today?

name: Game Master, Oberon
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose a character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hurts, doesn't it? I'll gradually let the pain increase, so you have something to look forward to.

name: Childhood Suguha
flavor_text: Hah! Hah!

name: Territory Leader of 《Sylph》, Sakuya
flavor_text: Excuse me……but could you explain what's happening?

name: Specialty of Sylvein
ability: Choose a 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your clock, and return it to your hand. Put this card into your clock.
flavor_text: I've never heard of it.

name: Fairy Dance
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Memories from Last Night
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is not a 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Dragon》 character, at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room. (The revealed card is returned to its original place.)

name: Silica's Relieved Smile
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Happening During Battle" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent, choose up to one card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Yes!

name: Silica Looking Up At the Sky
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: "As of 14:55, November 7, the game has been cleared--"

name: 《Leprechaun》 Girl, Lisbeth
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is five or more, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."
flavor_text: Heh heh, the stars of the show always turn up last.

name: Silica's Bashful Troubled Look
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Dragon》 characters.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: ……Did you see?

name: Lisbeth's Shining Smile
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck.

name: Rika Shinozaki
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Are you going to the meeting today?

name: Realization of Love, Lisbeth
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Back to Her Cheerful Self" is in your climax area, put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. If all those cards are 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: The warmth of Kirito's hands…… The way I feel…… I wasn't imagining it.

name: Ceasefire Agreement, Keiko
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, if the number of climax in your waiting room is three or more, put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavor_text: Letting those two enjoy their romance for a month…… You should have known better.

name: Keiko Ayano
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters in front of this card get +1 level and +500 power.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 or 《Dragon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Ceasefire Agreement, Rika
ability: 【AUTO】 Accelerate ［Put the top card of your deck into your clock］ At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Keiko in Uniform
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text: You shouldn't be watching.

name: Lisbeth's Material Gathering Adventure
flavor_text: Huh?

name: Caution Towards Kindness, Silica
flavor_text: Why…… would you do all this for me……?

name: Lisbeth Being Mean
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Then you'll have to help me every step of the way!

name: Lisbeth's Gentle Warmth
flavor_text: ……don't you need this?

name: Commander Eugene
ability: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand.

name: 《Demonic Sword Gram》
ability: Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
Until end of turn, your opponent cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand.
flavor_text: I'm amazed you're still alive!

name: Happening During Battle
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
（【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: K-Kirito, save me! Don't look, but save me!!

name: Back to Her Cheerful Self
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: ……you can't be here right now.

name: Yui's Adventure to Search for Mommy
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.

name: Demon of 《Dual-wielding》, Kirito
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(3) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card attacks, if your level is 3 or higher and the number of cards in your clock is six, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavor_text: Very well, if you'd rather settle this with swords, that's fine with me.

name: Kirito Takes Shelter
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: You're so strange. Don't you want to go back?

name: Kirito Takes on 《ALO》
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your other character attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, that character gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavor_text: I need to see for myself.

name: 《Spriggan》 Boy, Kirito
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond／"Asuna In a Birdcage" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Asuna In a Birdcage" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

【ACT】 Brainstorm ［(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: Just wait a little more, okay?

name: Kirito's Unshakable Belief
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +2000 power.

【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "《The Seed》" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: While I'm alive, I won't let any party members die.

name: Kirito's Married Life
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【ACT】 [(1)] Draw a card, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavor_text: He was a friendly guy.

name: Recovered Memories, Yui
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power.
【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 two of your 【STAND】 characters] When you use "Accelerate", you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: I'm a fake, all of me…… Even these tears…… I'm sorry.

name: Kirito - Two Worlds
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another "Asuna In a Birdcage", this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Confrontation Between the Strongest Players" is in your climax area, this card gets +3000 power until end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Encounter with an MMO, Kazuto
ability: 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Demon of 《Dual-wielding》, Kirito" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: I wasn't truly a part of this family. I learned this when I was ten.

name: 《Navigation Pixie》, Yui
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Reunion with Yui" is placed on your climax area, if the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters in your center stage is two or more, and this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters on the center stage, and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: And he's not my master, he's my dad.

name: Dressed Up Yui
flavor_text: I'm my own person.

name: Kirito in the 《Flower Garden》
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have is one or less, put this card into your clock.

name: Yui's Simple Answer
ability: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power.

name: Reseller, Agil
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)

name: Battle in the Front Lines, Kirito

name: Friendly Youth, Klein

ability: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
